body: LOL why can't any NTR artists make one with a satisfying ending? This is so cliché at this point. Try something new.
Agree it got a little weird at the end, but that was still hot. Love this style of tale.

The amount of sorrow our crossdresser is feeling right now is not to be ignored at once. He has the potential to be one of us!

Sending Acolyte-1 to convert this broken soul to our sanctum.
Pretty good i guess!
Somehow there are only negative comments. Well I for a change of pace quite liked this and overall I quite like Mikezoutei.

doesn't matter or how sad the boy's homelife is, you don't leave your son for another man, especially if that man is your son's bully. end of discussion. IRL: If my mom did that i'd say fuck you bitch and just go live with my father and forget her

She did the husband and son a favor by leaving. If she was willing to betray them over something like that then her loyalty and devotion to family were zero to begin with. It was only a matter of time so it's good that she's gone so her husband can re-marry and her son doesn't have to watch his mother whore it up. Although it's too bad about the new child , he probably won't be as lucky

u let your son's bully sweet talk you into sex and now u left your family for another man. It doesn't matter what the kid's homelife is like you chose the bully over your own son and husband and left. you going to hell for that.
